mapper.select:
select * from project p where 1=1
and (p.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%' )
and (p.kfqymc like '%'||#{kfqymc}||'%' )
and p.audit_type=#{auditType}
and p.kgrq>=#{startTime})
and p.jgrq<=#{endTime})
${item}
order by p.SYS_DATE desc

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from wf_audit p where p.PROJECTID=#{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
insert.if: update wf_audit p set p.shjg=#{shjg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, p.shry=#{shry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p.shrq=#{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, p.bz=#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p.SYS_UPD_DATE=sysdate where p.id = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into wf_audit( id, shjg, shry, shrq, bz, PROJECTID, SYS_DATE ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shjg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )

mapper.update: update project t set t.audit_type = #{type} WHERE t.id = #{id}
